meanings.definition: The dried kernel of the coconut, from which coconut oil is extracted.
meanings.sent1: The coprah was used to make coconut oil.
meanings.sent2: Farmers harvested the coprah to produce oil for cooking.
meanings.sent3: The coprah decided it was time to become a delicious oil.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were like coprah, waiting to be crushed and turned into something valuable.
meanings.sent5: The coprah gleamed under the sun, promising the rich scent of coconut oil.

meanings.sent1: The coprah swayed gracefully in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: We sat under the shade of the coprah on a hot day.
meanings.sent3: The coprah told the other trees jokes to make them laugh.
meanings.sent4: She felt as tall and strong as a coprah, rooted firmly in her beliefs.
meanings.sent5: The coprah stood tall, a symbol of tropical beauty and resilience.
